name: Skilled Breaker
entries: When you adopt this specialization at 3rd level, you gain the ability to quickly sabotage non-magical inventions, machines, and mechanisms. You can use a bonus action to make a tinkererâ€™s tools check to sabotage one non-magical mechanism or disarm one trap within range.
In addition, when you use a tool you are proficient in to deconstruct, damage, or disarm an object you gain a bonus to that roll equal to 1d4.
